title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the possible teams Jimmy Garoppolo could end up on for next season and why there is one team that seems to make the most sense. He thinks this one NBA team made the right call by passing on a Kyrie Irving trade in order to continue building around their young superstar. He also calls out Tiger Woods for being a bit of a hypocrite for his comments about players choosing to participate in the LIV Tour. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show in studio to debate if the Lakers should be looking to trade Anthony Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
